cause.description:
The Athens Music Foundation is a 501(c)3 tax-exempt non-profit organization founded on October 31, 2006.
One of our main missions is to improve the lives of underprivileged youth in Athens, GA.
Clarke county is one of the poorest counties in the entire nation, and it's the smallest county in the state of Georgia.
Because UGA takes up most of the county and doesn't pay real estate taxes, there are many children growing up in Athens that are underprivileged.
We believe that music is a language that can unite young people create a positive impact on their lives.
Music brings kids together, improves their learning and communication skills, builds self-confidence, allows an outlet for personal expression and creativity, and focuses their energies in positive ways.
Please spread the word and donate to this cause.
For more information, you can also email us at athensmusic@gmail.com
Sincerely,
Brinkley Warren Co-Founder Athens Music Foundation
1. Music Education is Essential to a child's curriculum
2. Providing Musical instruments to underprivelaged kids in Athens will change their lives
3. The Boys and Girls Clubs are established and trust-worth, which is why we are partnering with them so that kids can jam and learn music after school
4. Music is the medicine of the mind
cause.mission: Raise money to purchase musical instruments, computers, and music education materials for the afterschool programs of the Boys and Girsls Clubs of Athens.
cause.name: Athens Music Education
